news.title: Facebook and Twitter CEOs to Attend Hearing About Section 230 Protections
news.description: Mark Zuckerberg and Jack Dorsey will testify before the Senate Commerce Committee on protections for online platforms from legal liability for content posted by their users.

news.title: The Justice Department has filed its antitrust lawsuit against Google
news.description: The DOJ joins 11 states in arguing that Google is maintaining illegal monopolies in the markets for general search services, search advertising, and general search text advertising.

news.title: Congressional Antitrust Report Into Apple and Others Delayed as Two Sides Negotiate
news.description: Republican and Democrat members of the committee agree that antitrust concerns require greater oversight of the tech industry, but they have not agreed on an appropriate solution.

news.title: Instagram Starts Labeling ‘State-controlled Media’ Accounts and Posts
news.description: Labels will appear on Instagram profile pages and posts, identifying content from media outlets that are believed to be at least partly under the editorial control of their government.
